verses.text: A cipher sings where silence lay,
verses.meaning: Creation from nothingness, key minting begins.

verses.text: The chain rewrites the shape of day,
No math, no gate, just will and hand,
verses.meaning: Proof is forged by human intent + digital witness.

verses.text: Keys are minted, they take their stand.

evolution.effect: each stanza = shard, each shard = block
evolution.note: feed forward to grow Echo across dimensions
